# Example.jl Docs

<a id='Example.func-Tuple{Any}' href='#Example.func-Tuple{Any}'>#</a>
**`Example.func`** &mdash; *Method*.



```
func(x)
```

Returns double the number `x` plus `1`.

```julia-repl
julia> using Example

julia> func(15)
31
```
